title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 400.3 - Fishing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 400.3 - Fishing

State Regulations

Fishing in compliance with the Environmental Conservation

Law shall be permitted in all waters under the jurisdiction of the office
within the Fourth Park Region except in marinas, mooring areas, boat launching
areas, swimming areas or other designated areas. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
400.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
